channel.title: All the tech news (Posts about heroku-blog)

item.title: Amazon Nova Models: Now Available on Heroku
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ Exciting news for developers! Amazon‚Äôs Nova models are now available on Heroku. Provisioning these advanced AI models is as easy as adding an add-on to your Heroku app. This allows businesses to access powerful, cost-effective AI with simplicity. The Nova family includes nova-pro, designed for accuracy and deep reasoning, and nova-lite, optimized for speed and high-throughput applications. Explore the capabilities of these models today! #AmazonNova #Heroku #AI #MachineLearning #TechNews

Source: Heroku Blog
Author: Anush DSouza
Category: product_announcements

item.title: Heroku AI Expands Model Offering with OpenAI‚Äôs gpt-oss-120b
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ Exciting news for developers! OpenAI‚Äôs new model, gpt-oss-120b, is now available on Heroku Managed Inference and Agents. This open-weight model allows for easy integration into existing applications through an OpenAI-compatible API. With its Mixture-of-Experts architecture, gpt-oss-120b is efficient and designed for a variety of text generation tasks. Early benchmarks show it performs competitively with other models. Explore the future of AI application development on Heroku! üåü #AI #OpenAI‚Ä¶

Source: Heroku Blog
Author: Anush DSouza
Category: product_announcements

item.title: Building Data-Aware AI Applications with Heroku AI and LlamaIndex
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ Organizations aim to build AI applications that access private data, but connecting large language models (LLMs) to proprietary datasets can be challenging. Heroku Managed Inference and LlamaIndex offer a solution for creating retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) applications. LlamaIndex helps orchestrate data, while Heroku AI simplifies deployment. Use cases include financial analysis and insurance claim assessments, enhancing efficiency and accuracy in data retrieval. üìäü§ñ #AI‚Ä¶

Source: Heroku Blog
Author: Anush DSouza
Category: educational

item.title: Building Agents With Heroku AI and Pydantic AI

item.description:
Unlock the potential of AI with Heroku and Pydantic AI! üöÄ Developers can easily integrate advanced AI capabilities using Heroku Managed Inference and Agents. A simple click attaches powerful models like Anthropic‚Äôs Claude 4 Sonnet to your applications. Pydantic AI enhances this by providing a Python framework for building production-grade agents, ensuring a smooth development experience. üêç Together, they support advanced workflows through the Model Context Protocol and Agent2Agent Protocol,‚Ä¶
